name: Ace Detective: Find The Clue
description:
When there's unsolved case, it's time for you to take yourself in. Solve puzzling mysteries, start with investigating one crime scene to look for clues, then visit another scenes to collect more clues. Look deeper into the clues to uncover the untold stories that lead you to solve the mysteries. Only you can pull the brilliant deduction!

How do you uncover the mystery? Share us via info@alegrium.com.
